content: **knitted hat in drops alpaca bouclé and drops alpaca piece is knitted bottom up with double folding edge ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ab-162 yarn group c + a or d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl head circumference 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 0100 off white and use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-100-100 g colour 100 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 17 row vertically in stocking stitch and 2 strands on needle size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
